info.title: AmazonAdsAPI - Forecasts (beta)
info.description: The Forecasts API offers campaign-level performance, delivery, and spend forecasts currently available on forecasting widgets. This includes campaign flight level forecasts for spend, reach, CPC, CPA, and ROAS. The API provides forecasts both for new orders and existing orders that are spending budget.

post.description: A retrieve by ID read. More performant than query.

creationDateTime.description: The creation date of the campaign forecast.

flightForecasts.description: The forecast results of multiple flights of the campaign.

availableForecastFlights.description: The combination of existing flight settings and proposed flight settings based on forecasting.

DSPCampaignForecastDescription.description: The description of which campaign and what features are enabled for a forecast.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign the ad group belongs to.

flightIds.description: The unique identifier of the flight.

DSPCurve.description: The forecast curve of Bid/Spend vs the metric type based on periodicity.

DSPDeliverInFullConfidence.description: Description of how confident we delivery 100% of the ads for the specific metric.

DSPDeliverInFullConfidenceLevel.description:
| DeliverInFullConfidenceLevel | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `HIGH` | There is a high level of confidence that the campaign or flight will fully deliver its planned budget or impressions. |
| `MEDIUM` | There is a moderate level of confidence that the campaign or flight will fully deliver its planned budget or impressions. |
| `LOW` | There is a low level of confidence that the campaign or flight will fully deliver its planned budget or impressions. |
| `UNAVAILABLE` | Confidence level cannot be determined due to insufficient or missing data. |

DSPEnabledFeaturesInCampaignForecast.description: For the user to specify which features to enable in the forecast result.

curve.description: Describe if the user want to see curve or not.

replanning.description: Describe if the forecast will show replanning recommendation.

campaignSettingsCache.description: Describe if the forecast will use cached settings of a campaign.

DSPFlightForecast.description: The forecast result of a specific flight.

forecastStartDateTime.description: The starttime of the flight for forecasting.

forecastEndDateTime.description: The endtime of the flight for forecasting.

spend.description: The amount of money spend for this flight.

metrics.description: The different metrics to measure the performance of the flight.

curves.description: The forecasting curves of a flight based on different periodicities.

flightId.description: The ID associated with the flight.

startDateTime.description: The start date of the flight.

DSPForecastMetric.description: The forecast based on metric and periodicity.

DSPForecastMetricsDescription.description: Describe how user select to see all metrics or selected ones.

allMetrics.description: If it is true, all the supported metrics would return.

selectedMetrics.description: The list of selected metrics in order.

DSPForecastPeriodicity.description:
| ForecastPeriodicity | Description |
| --- | --- |
| `DAILY` | Forecast results are generated and presented for each individual day. |
| `LIFETIME` | Forecast results represent the total performance over the remaining entire campaign duration. |
| `MONTHLY` | Forecast results are aggregated and presented for each calendar month. |
| `WEEKLY` | Forecast results are aggregated and presented for each calendar week. |

value.description: The monetary amount of the budget cap in the given currency.
